name: Thundertale
description:
You're not REALLY genocidal. ...are you?

Features custom artwork, attacks, and music, and over 5 unique endings!
See some screenshots here.

[Arrows] - Move
[Z] or [Enter] - Confirm
[X] or [Shift] - Cancel
[ESC] (Hold) - Reset

Flash port, art, and battle by Serule Blue.
Undertale and SFX by Toby Fox.
BGM by Checqz.
